other_tests.findings: 1+ (<1 per 1000X FIELD): POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.

Hyperexpansion of the lungs consistent with emphysema. Mild cardiomegaly without significant vascular congestion. There is no focal consolidation, pneumothorax, or pleural effusion. The cardiomediastinal silhouette and the hila are unremarkable.
